How to use Data Science
Understanding Machine Learning Vs Data Science

visible_instructors.job_title: Deep Learning/Machine Learning Enthusiast and Youtuber

items.headline: If you are tired of not going further step after watching MNIST Tutorial, you are welcome!
objectives_summary: Enrolled students can easily code all the subprocesses of convolutional neural network.
Enrolled students can distinguish the problem of not-working Convolutional Neural Networks.
Enrolled students can apply several solutions for the loading images on Python.

items.title: Understanding New Data - Exploratory Analysis in R
items.headline: Learn how to use R to quickly understand and analyze new data and start your data analysis projects with ease
objectives_summary: Identify suitable R libraries for data exploration
Create suitable data visualizations
Learn the succession of steps in data exploration

items.title: Build & Deploy 8 Powerful Python Projects: Masterclass 2021
items.headline: Learn To Develop & Deploy Real World Python Web Application Development Projects With Django PyQt5, SQLite Course
objectives_summary: Understand how using frameworks like Django will save you a ton of time in web development
Improve your web development and coding resume
Learn how to use Python in Web Development

items.title: Clean Machine Learning Code
items.headline: Even Bad ML Code Can Function. This course provides practical solutions to prevent disasters in ML software product.
objectives_summary: The studens will learn how to apply practical software engineering principles to prevent failures in their machine learning software projects.
Fundamental software engineering concepts applied to ML code to boost maintainability, collaboration, and production-readiness.
Principles of ML Software Architecture.

items.title: Employee Attrition Prediction in Apache Spark (ML) Project
items.headline: Employee attrition Prediction in Apache Spark (ML) & HR Analytics Employee Attrition & Performance project for beginners
objectives_summary: In this course we will implement Spark Machine Learning Project Employee Attrition Prediction in Apache Spark using Databricks Notebook (Community server)
Launching Apache Spark Cluster
Process that data using a Machine Learning model (Spark ML Library)

items.title: LEARNING PATH: Statistics and Data Mining for Data Science
items.headline: Dive deep into the statistical and data mining techniques to get useful insights out of your data
objectives_summary: Get familiar with the basics of analyzing data
Exploring the importance of summarizing individual variables
Use inferential statistics and know when to perform the Chi-Square test

items.title: Python Machine Learning: Projects, Tips and Troubleshooting
items.headline: Practical solutions to Machine Learning problems, avoiding roadblocks while working with Python data science ecosystem.
objectives_summary: Use pre-written libraries in python to work with powerful algorithms.
Tips and tricks to speed up your modeling process and obtain better results.
Make predictions using advanced regression analysis with Python.

items.title: Learn Basic Data Visualization with R
items.headline: Learn The Basic Concepts of Data Visualisation. You will learn how to visualise the data using R programming tool.
objectives_summary: Data visualization and its importance
R Analytics tool
Importing Data into R from different Sources.

items.title: Create & Deploy Data Science,Deep Learning Web Apps 2021
items.headline: Learn development & deployment of machine learning and deep learning application projects with python on heruko
objectives_summary: Build Deep Learning Models
Deployment Of  Deep Learning Applications
Deep Learning Practical Applications

items.title: Fundamentals of Convolutional Neural Network (CNN)
items.headline: Learn how to classify images using convolutional neural network
objectives_summary: Classify images using Convolutional Neural Network (CNN)

items.headline: Become an expert in modern tech stack (asyncio, flatbuffers, NATS, and Docker) to design, integrate and deploy AI apps
objectives_summary: A complete end-to-end solution consisting of 3 distributed applications using asyncio, flatbuffers, NATS and Docker
Translate the requirements of a big and complex machine learning project into a scalable solution
How to divide complex problem into simple & manageable parts using microservices style architecture ?

items.title: Build your deep learning portfolio: Meditations with LSTM
items.headline: In this deep learning tutorial I will teach you how to build an LSTM model, which generates text.
objectives_summary: Create an LSTM for generating text

items.title: Build Real World Data Science & Machine Learning Projects
items.headline: Data Science Practical Course: Learn To Build 20 Data Science, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP Projects With Python
objectives_summary: Build Best Performing Machine Learning Models
Have a great intuition of many data science models
Make robust data science models

items.title: Deep Learning and Reinforcement Learning with Tensorflow
items.headline: Develop smart agents & train them using Reinforcement Learning with Tensorflow’s neural networks
objectives_summary: Build a base for TensorFlow by implementing regression
Solve prediction & Image classification deep learning problems with TensorFlow
Utilize the power of efficient data representation using autoencoders

items.title: Fraud Analytics in Banking and Credit using Machine Learning

visible_instructors.title: Exam Turf
visible_instructors.name: Exam
visible_instructors.job_title: #1 Brand for Competitive Exam Preparation and Test Series

items.headline: Understand fraud detection analytics and the robust internal controls and risk management system in organizations
objectives_summary: Learn about basic banking system concepts that are needed to resolve and understand what kind of frauds are taking place in the banking sectors every day
In this Fraud Analytics Training, firstly you will be introduced to fraud and its types which are very important to resolve any kind of fraud
Learn about some analytical subjects and concepts that are used to analyze and predict the data that are causing harm to the organizations or banks/individual
